com.vub.service

Class KeyService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.vub.service.KeyService

  • public class KeyService
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides general functionality regarding keys. This includes CRUD operations, generating keys, etc.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      KeyService()

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Create (persist) a key in the database

      Find a key in the database
      java.util.List<Key> findKeysAssignedToUser(User user)
      Returns a list of all Key objects currently assigned to a certain user

      Find a user in the database, given a key string-representation
      Key generateActivationKey(User user)
      Generate an activation key based on the provided user (and save the key to the database immediately)
      Key generatePasswordForgotKey(User user)
      Gernerate a passwordforgot key and immediately save it to the database

        Parameters:

      • findKey

        public Key findKey(java.lang.String key)
            throws KeyNotFoundException
        Find a key in the database
        Parameters:
        key - The unique keystring which identifies the key
        Returns:
        Key object which is the resulted key
        Throws:
        KeyNotFoundException - When the key could not be found in the database

      • findKeysAssignedToUser

        public java.util.List<Key> findKeysAssignedToUser(User user)
        Returns a list of all Key objects currently assigned to a certain user
        Parameters:
        user - User to find the keys for
        Returns:
        Returns a list of Keys

      • findUserByKey

        public User findUserByKey(java.lang.String keyString)
                   throws KeyNotFoundException,
                          UserNotFoundException
        Find a user in the database, given a key string-representation
        Parameters:
        keyString - Key-string that is a valid key in the database
        Returns:
        Returns the user who is associated with the key.
        Throws:
        KeyNotFoundException - Key could not be found in the database (and as a result, the associated user couldn't either)
        UserNotFoundException - When the User attached to the Key cannot be found

      • deleteKey

        public void deleteKey(Key key)
        Delete a key from the database
        Parameters:
        key - Key which needs deleting

      • deleteKey

        public void deleteKey(java.lang.String key)
        Delete a key-string from the database. The associated key object will first be looked up in the database before deleting.
        Parameters:
        key - Keystring to be deleted from the database

      • generateActivationKey

        public Key generateActivationKey(User user)
        Generate an activation key based on the provided user (and save the key to the database immediately)
        Parameters:
        user - User to generate the activation key for
        Returns:
        The key which has been saved to the database

      • generatePasswordForgotKey

        public Key generatePasswordForgotKey(User user)
        Gernerate a passwordforgot key and immediately save it to the database
        Parameters:
        user - User to generate the key for
